alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus; Mecklenburg; Union (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 28 at 5:25AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FOR FINE PARTICULATES UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FOR OZONE FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM EDT TODAY... The North Carolina Department of Environmental Quality in Raleigh NC has issued a Code Orange Air Quality Action Day for Fine Particulates for Mecklenburg, Cabarrus, and Union Counties until midnight tonight. Also, a Code Orange Air Quality Action Day for Ground Level Ozone has been issued for Mecklenburg, Cabarrus, and Union Counties, from 10 AM to 8 PM EDT today. An Air Quality Action Day means that Ground Level Ozone and Fine Particulates concentrations within the region may approach or exceed unhealthy standards. For additional information, please visit the North Carolina Division of Air Quality Web site at https://airquality.climate.ncsu.edu/.
